title: 465- A Special Mother’s Day Episode
itunes:title: 465- A Special Mother’s Day Episode
description: On this special Mother’s Day episode, Public Health On Call host Dr. Josh Sharfstein interviews retired pediatrician, Dr. Margaret Sharfstein, aka Josh's mom. Together they discuss the early stages of COVID, the impact it had on her perception of age, her concerns throughout the pandemic, and even why she nicknamed him “Dr. No”.
